overview: Action - A ruthless Mexican drug lord known simply as "La Rocha" (José Alonso) -- or "The Rock" -- moves his operation to the treacherous jungles of Peru, where he is pursued relentlessly by the crime-fighting trio La Gran Sangre. But it won't be easy for our three heroes, who must contend with a pair of deadly female mercenaries hired to protect La Rocha. High-speed chases on land, sea and air fill this pulse-pounding action thriller. -  Carlos Alcántara, José Alonso, Lita Baluarte
title: La gran sangre - La pelicula
